lexUnit.name: sleepy.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: needing or ready for sleep.

sentence.text: I was too sleepy to wonder how he 'd managed , at this time of night . "
I seemed to be a lot happier than the rest of my fellow travellers who seemed to be very sleepy .
` Harry 's sleepy , " she said .
They were sleepy .
He was feeling sleepy .
I hoped she was n't getting sleepy ; the drone of the wee Citroen 's engine was cataleptically monotonous .
A fat white cat sat on a wall and watched them with sleepy eyes .
` Good morning , madam , " said Dalziel with effusive politeness to the large woman who stood there , still rubbing her sleepy eyes .
Turning her head , she met a slow , sleepy smile from Ross as he , too , raised himself to a sitting position against the pillows .
The two of them were drooping by then , in reaction from their long and laborious walk home , and sleepy from the wine mulled for them with their supper .
Ellen sat up in bed , rubbing her eyes with her knuckles like a sleepy child .
He is up and about before his father and he gets his father up , as if he were the parent and his father the sleepy child .
And first , they waited for the outsiders to go , and for the sleepy children to slip off , melt away through the trees .
Perhaps he was still sleepy , or had just indulged in a stultifying beetle meal .
When she returns from theatre she is rather sleepy but is allowed to take fluids as soon as she feels able to sit up in bed .
Crisp colours of blue and green , and the stark black of the rocks , and a pleasant breeze that made her feel slightly sleepy .
` I 'm not very sleepy , " she whispered .
When he lifted sleepy eyes towards her his voice , though still soft , was slightly incredulous .
She pulled herself straight and directed into his sleepy eyes the look she usually reserved for teachers and principals .
` I am sleepy , now that you mention it . "
Mrs Wright was the sleepy young woman whom the Collector had found so desirable on the occasion of his visit to the billiard room .
` She was tired and sleepy but soon woke up when we came to her side .
Susan was sleepy .
He heard the sleepy voice answer the phone .
